Package com.halloween.controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.halloween.controller.Game
  • public class Game
extends Object
    This Game class initializes the game, manages the user status, and creates the Win scenarios for the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Game()
      Initializes an instance of Game.
      Game​(State state, Player player, Neighborhood neighborhood)
      Initializes an instance of Game by reading in saved data.

      • Game

        public Game​(State state,
            Player player,
            Neighborhood neighborhood)
        Initializes an instance of Game by reading in saved data.
        Parameters:
        state - State of the game.
        player - An instance of the player where the player's data is stored.
        neighborhood - An instance of the neighborhood, which represents the world in the game.
